Headline: #87 87thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/Western
ShortDescription: Westbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Ashland, 95th and Western: due to, street blockage near 87th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Ashland, 95th and Western: due to, street blockage near 87th/Western.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
